row.process: :set &rpt# = prep_process_report(,&prun#,'PLOG','*R3_MODIFY_VARIANT*','col=delimiter','delimiter=*"*') :process &rpt# :set &line# = get_process_line(&rpt#,2) :set &varname# = get_process_line(&rpt#,4) :set &selname# = get_process_line(&rpt#,6) :set &value# = get_process_line(&rpt#,10) @echo program = &line#; variant = &varname#; parameter = &selname#; value = &value# >> C:\OUT_&RUN#.TXT :endprocess &rpt# :close_process &rpt#
